entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
